sen.j: 三条実教（さんじょうさねのり、生年不詳 - 寛永18年8月27日 (旧暦)（1641年10月1日））は、室町時代後期から江戸時代の公家。
sen.e: Sanenori SANJO (it is not known when was born - October 1, 1641) was a kuge (court noble) who lived in the era from the Muromachi period to the Edo period.
Sanenori SANJO (it is not known when was born - October 1, 1641) was a kuge (court noble) who lived during the era from the Muromachi period to the Edo period.
Sanenori SANJO (year of birth unknown - October 1, 1641) was a kuge (court noble) who lived during the era from the end of Muromachi period to the Edo period.
His father was Kine OGIMACHISANJO.
His father was Kine OGIMACHISANJO.
His father was Kine OGIMACHISANJO.
Kinhisa HANAZONO was his son.
Kinhisa HANAZONO was his son.
Kinhisa HANAZONO was his son.

sen.j: 官位は従四位上左近衛中将。
sen.e: His governmental rank was Sakone no chujo (a middle captain of the left division of inner palace guards) at the rank of Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).
His government rank was Sakone no chujo (middle captain of the left division of inner palace guards) and held the rank of Jushiijo (Junior 4rth Rank, Upper Grade).
His government rank was Sakone no chujo (middle captain of the left division of inner palace guards) and held the rank of Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).
He was the founder of the Hanazono family.
He was the founder of the Hanazono family.
He was the founder of the Hanazono family.

sen.j: 三条家の分家正親町三条家に生まれた。
sen.e: He was born in the Ogimachisanjo family, a branch of the Sanjo family.
He was born in the Ogimachisanjo family, a branch of the Sanjo family.
He was born in the Ogimachisanjo family, a branch of the Sanjo family.

sen.j: 三条家の養子に入ったが、なぜか彼の子孫は三条家を継いでいない。
sen.e: He was adopted by the Sanjo family, but none of his descendents became the head of the Sanjo family, tough the reason is not known.
He was adopted by the Sanjo family, but none of his descendents became the head of the Sanjo family, though the reason is not known.
He was adopted by the Sanjo family, but none of his descendents became the head of the Sanjo family, though the reason is not known.

sen.j: 官位も低めであるから早世したと思われる。
sen.e: Because his governmental rank was rather low, it is considered that he died young.
Because his governmental rank was rather low, it is surmised that he died young.
Because his governmental rank was rather low, it is surmised that he died young.

sen.j: 三条家の名跡は別の三条家分家である三条西家からの養子三条実綱が継いだ。
sen.e: The name of Sanjo was inherited by the of Sanetsuna SANJO who was adopted from the the Sanjo-nishi family, another branch of the Sanjo family.
The name Sanjo was inherited by Sanetsuna SANJO who was adopted from the the Sanjo-nishi family, another branch of the Sanjo family.
The name Sanjo was inherited by Sanetsuna SANJO who was adopted from the Sanjo-nishi family, another branch of the Sanjo family.

sen.j: なお実教の子孫は正親町三条家の分家「花園家」となっていく。
sen.e: The descendents of Sanenori formed the Hanazono family, a branch of the Ogimachisanjo family.
The descendents of Sanenori formed the Hanazono family, a branch of the Ogimachisanjo family.
The descendents of Sanenori formed the Hanazono family, a branch of the Ogimachisanjo family.
